alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 8:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bay, Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 915 PM EDT/815 PM CDT/... At 819 PM EDT/719 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Freeport, Ebro, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Portland, Alpine Heights, Villa Tasso, Seminole Hills, Gulf Resort Beach, Blue Mountain Beach, De Funiak Spring Airport, Seaside, Rock Hill and Pleasant Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
